casino_games.name: Blackjack
casino_games.fun_fact: Blackjack has the best odds of winning, with a house edge of just 1% in most casinos.

casino_games.name: Roulette
casino_games.fun_fact: The numbers on a roulette wheel add up to 666, known as the 'Number of the Beast'.

casino_games.name: Poker
casino_games.fun_fact: The longest poker game in history lasted 8 years, 5 months, and 3 days.

casino_games.name: Slots
casino_games.fun_fact: The first slot machine was invented in 1895 by Charles Fey in San Francisco.

casino_games.name: Baccarat
casino_games.fun_fact: Baccarat is James Bond's favorite casino game.

casino_games.name: Craps
casino_games.fun_fact: The term 'craps' is derived from the French word 'crapaud', meaning toad.

casino_games.name: Keno
casino_games.fun_fact: Keno originated in China and was used to fund the construction of the Great Wall.
